stem-table.stem: Consonants, Dipthongs, ι, ω ω-STEM (no feminine or neuter) τ-MUTE or DENTAL (τ,δ,θ,ατ) LIQUID, NASAL (incl. SYNCOPATED LIQUID)(λ,ρ) (ν) (ερ >> ρ) (no neuter) STEMS IN ς (ες,ας,ος) π-MUTE/κ-MUTE or LABIAL/PALATAL (no neuter) STEMS IN ι and υ STEMS IN DIPTHONG (ευ,αυ,ου) (no neuter) (οι) (no masculine or neuter)
